title: Since you buffed two toxic lane bully Daruis and Rene, Can we have TP CDR back ?
body:
Like very please atleast give us something that we can use to get back in my lane after a dumb toxic champion like {{champion:58}} and {{champion:122}} dive us under tower with ignite and run all over other champions in the lane cause we can't get back easily due to huge CDR on TP.

Like {{champion:58}} right now just can use ignite + PTA not even Conquer plus full combo under our tower and it either result in death under tower or survive with 10% hp left depend on champion. 

It not hard to do that right ? Since it all about lane bullies that can abuse Ghost or Ignite or anything due to their huge sustain and damage in lane, atleast give us a legit chance to make a come back in lane by short down the TP CDR.

And i don't care about buff, i care about lane bully running over me over and over due to short ignite CDR while TP having fat CDR

TP outscales ignite, just don't feed them.

Simply survive laning phase to deny the enemy snowball until you move into mid game where you can make macro stuff happen with TP advantage.

Additionally, the TP disadvantage means that kills on them puts them very far behind if you shove in after and especially if you take plates.

Ignite is risk/reward. The last nerf it got knocked it down to a reasonable level.

Also PS: PtA is a way better laning burst option for Renekton, so it makes sense that that's what he's running when he's diving you. They run Conqueror for late game survivability and potential 1v3s with Spear. A Conqueror Renekton won't be attempting dives almost ever in lane until they have ult or even until Spear.

Im tired of Bruisers being in this constant flux of having a handful of OP ones while every other bruiser is trash/ just shut down by whatever oppressive ranged champ is booted out of Mid and bot, or having the entire class be trash because Tanks damage gets buffed high enough to make them redundant until they get nerfed in the ground again and the cycle repeats, because god forbid that maybe buffing everything by giving it more damage is not the best solution 100% of the time.

Which as i have said before come from the fact League is exclusivity banking on Twitch and LCS dosh now, so everything must be fun to watch first, and actually balanced second.
